TextEng: "No, that's it."
"I think we need to part ways."
"All right, fine. Stay with me, then."
"Wait here until I return."
"Leave me. Now."
"I want to change your tactics."
"I don't want to change anything else right now."
"I don't want you to cast any spells until I say otherwise."
"I want you to go ahead and cast spells on your own."
"Do not try to use dispel magic spells to remove disabling effects from party members."
Text: "동료들의 무력화 효과를 제거하기 위해 주문해제를 사용하지 마."

TextEng: "Use dispel magic spells to remove disabling effects from party members."
Text: "동료들의 무력화 효과를 제거하기 위해 주문해제를 사용해."

TextEng: "I want you to leave any traps you see alone for now."
"I want you to disarm any traps that you see."
"Don't try to be stealthy anymore."
"Stay stealthy, but only until the next fight."
"I need you to be stealthy right now."
"Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 돕지 마."

TextEng: "Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 도와줘."

TextEng: "I want to change the distance you stay away from me."
"Stay a long distance away from me."
"Keep a medium distance."
"Stay close."
"Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies."
"Defend me and don't attack until I do."
"I want to adjust your equipment."
"I want you to use one of your special abilities."
"Divine Shield."
"Divine Might."
"Lay on Hands."
"What was it you wanted to say earlier?"
"Let's stop and talk for a moment."
"All right, enough of this discussion."
"How are you feeling?"
"What are you going to do when all this is over?"
Text: "이 모든 게 끝나면 뭘 할 거야?"

TextEng: "Back to my other questions."
"A sound plan. I'm impressed, Aribeth."
"No, I won't allow it."
"Assuming you can leave Cania..."
"To what end?"
"Why did you almost become one of the Lost?"
"Back to my other questions."
"The Hells can pose no threat to any of us."
Text: "지옥은 우리 중 누구에게도 위협이 될 수 없어."

TextEng: "You're welcome, Aribeth. I'm happy to have helped."
"Hmph. I should have known to leave things be..."
"What is it like to be a spirit?"
"Back to my other questions."
"Much as I expected, then."
"It must be horrible for you!"
"It could be worse..."
"What exactly happened in Neverwinter, anyway?"
"Goodbye."
"Back to my other questions."
"How did you die? How did you end up here?"
"But they defeated you. They turned you back..."
"Why would you do such a thing?"
"Whose army did you lead?"
"But who did you serve?"
"But before that. There was a time you called the city home."
Text: "하지만 그 전에. 그 도시를 고향이라고 부르던 때가 있었잖아."

TextEng: "Why would you wish to be ignorant?"
"I think we need to part ways."
"All right, fine. Stay with me, then."
"Wait here until I return."
"Leave me. Now."
"I want to change your tactics."
"I don't want to change anything else right now."
"I don't want you to cast any spells until I say otherwise."
"I want you to go ahead and cast spells on your own."
"Do not try to use dispel magic spells to remove disabling effects from party members."
Text: "동료들의 무력화 효과를 제거하기 위해 주문해제를 사용하지 마."

TextEng: "Use dispel magic spells to remove disabling effects from party members."
Text: "동료들의 무력화 효과를 제거하기 위해 주문해제를 사용해."

TextEng: "Do not disarm traps that you see."
"Disarm any traps that you see."
"Don't try to be stealthy anymore."
"Stay stealthy, but only until the next fight."
"I need you to be stealthy right now."
"Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 돕지 마."

TextEng: "Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 도와줘."

TextEng: "I want to change the distance you stay away from me."
"Stay a long distance away from me."
"Keep a medium distance."
"Stay close."
"Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies."
"Defend me and don't attack until I do."
"I want to adjust your equipment."
"What was it you wanted to say earlier?"
"Let's stop and talk for a moment."
"All right, enough of this discussion."
"How are you feeling?"
"What are you going to do when all this is over?"
Text: "이 모든 게 끝나면 뭘 할 거야?"

TextEng: "Back to my other questions."
"A sound plan. I'm impressed."
"No, I'll never let you."
"Assuming you can leave Cania..."
"To what end?"
"Why did you almost become one of the Lost?"
"Back to my other questions."
"I'm glad I could help."
"You're welcome."
"What have I done?"
"What is it like to be a spirit?"
"Back to my other questions."
"I think you're mad."
"That's disgusting!"
"Sounds pleasant..."
"What exactly happened in Neverwinter, anyway?"
"Goodbye."
"Back to my other questions."
"How did you die? How did you end up here?"
"Yet they defeated you..."
"But why? What drove you to such an end?"
"You didn't love Fenthick?"
"Whose army did you lead?"
"But before that. You lived there, didn't you?"
"What hypocrisy?"
"Not right now, Aribeth. Stay warm."
"Yes, I'd like you to travel with me again."
"Not really. I just wanted to rub your nose in it a little."
"Come along but keep your comments to yourself."
"Sorry, not now. We'll talk about it later."
"Yes, Aribeth?"
"Goodbye."
"Well I have no time to hear your religious lectures."
Text: "뭐, 네 종교 설교를 들을 시간이 없어."

TextEng: "You're the expert. Explain to me the nature of the Hells..."
"Do you take issue with your punishment?"
"The Hells are a little colder than I expected, that's for sure."
"Back to my other questions."
"Why ice and lava? It doesn't make sense."
"Mephistopheles is coming back, isn't he?"
"Why would he just abandon this place?"
"Temple training?"
"Goodbye."
"Keep them to yourself. I have no time to hear them."
"Forget Neverwinter! It was nothing but a city of fools."
"What memories?"
"Not happy memories, I assume?"
"Why would Lord Nasher have been scared?"
"Tell me of their deaths."
"Tell me of Fenthick and Desther."
"Goodbye."
"That's a responsibility I'll shoulder, then."
"Don't worry. All we want is the Gatekeeper's."
Text: "걱정 마. 우리가 원하는 건 문지기의 것뿐이야."

TextEng: "If that's what it takes to do good in the world."
"Hold on, we need to free her first."
"Stop lecturing me, all right? I can handle it!"
"What's the matter? Scared I might learn yours?"
Text: "무슨 일이야? 내가 네 걸 알까 봐 겁나?"

TextEng: "I'll keep it in mind."
"You give sound advice, Aribeth. I will heed it well."
"Goodbye."
"Where do you recognize it from?"
"Innocent?"
"You thought you loved him."
"You were young."
"But you've never been here before."
"Where do you recognize the tree from?"
"I think we've found the Knower of Places, then."
Text: "그럼 우리가 공간의 현자를 찾은 것 같네."

TextEng: "Don't get your hopes up."
"It's just any old tree."
"What tree?"
"Goodbye."
"Yes, I'm plotting a painful demise for the little beast..."
Text: "그래, 그 작은 짐승에게 고통스러운 최후를 계획 중이야..."

TextEng: "And I couldn't help see the look of interest on yours..."
Text: "그리고 네 얼굴에 보이는 관심을 보지 않을 수 없었어..."

TextEng: "You'd be shocked too. It's rather cold down here."
"Keep you hands to yourself, ghost. I'm not interested."
"Hey now, I thought you were supposed to be good!"
"Mind your own business... And stop laughing."
Text: "네 일이나 신경 써... 그리고 웃지 마."

TextEng: "Well keep your hands to yourself. I'm not interested."
"Are you flirting with me?"
"Expectations? I thought you were supposed to be good!"
"Well I'm not interested, all right?"
"A surprise but not an unwelcome one."
"Love?"
"I... I just don't think I'm ready for it, Aribeth."
Text: "난... 아직 준비가 안 된 것 같아, 아리베스."

TextEng: "When it comes to dead girls? Yes. Definitely frightening."
"Frightening? Terrifying is more like it!"
"No, I think I like it..."
"Whoa, slow down. Marry?"
"Goodbye."
"All I feel is the weight of dust and time."
"It serves you right, you traitor..."
"Good, I'm glad I'm not the only one."
"I'm sorry, I didn't mean to be so harsh."
"Yes, I can. There's a happiness here."
"All right, let's get down to business."
"It's good to see you happy."
"That's how you are, too, isn't it?"
"It's all in your head. Now stop your prancing around."
Text: "네 상상일 뿐이야. 이제 껑충거리는 거 그만해."

TextEng: "I just want to go home, Aribeth."
"Fine, I can feel it! But you can't make me like it..."
Text: "좋아, 느껴져! 하지만 좋아하게 만들 순 없어..."

TextEng: "Hope just gets you killed."
"Being trapped in the Nine Hells put a damper on things..."
"Let's just drop it, all right? We've got work to do."
"You're right, I need to loosen up a little."
"I'm not interested in a lecture on virtues, Aribeth."
"Goodbye."
"Through that portal is vengeance, nothing more."
Text: "저 차원문 너머엔 복수뿐, 그 이상 없어."

TextEng: "True, I must face Mephistopheles with no evil in my heart."
Text: "맞아, 마음속에 악의 없이 메피스토펠레스와 맞서야 해."

TextEng: "Hope, then. It doesn't matter. Just follow."
"To each their own. For me, it is vengeance."
"It's all right. I'm going with you."
"We all have devils on our back, Aribeth."
Text: "우리 모두 등에 마귀를 지고 있어, 아리베스."

TextEng: "Let's go."
<StartAction>[Aribeth]</Start> "Va'ardalia the Twinsouled..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Feel no guilt regarding what transpired in Neverwinter."
Text: "네버윈터에서 일어난 일에 대해 죄책감을 느끼지 마."

TextEng: "You are right. I will not ask that of you."
"Don't you see? This is your atonement... It's all right..."
"I just don't want to see you suffer so."
Text: "그저 네가 그렇게 고통받는 걸 보고 싶지 않을 뿐이야."

TextEng: "Yes, Aribeth. Dead and cold..."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I command you to pursue evil, not good."
"I command you to love me..."
"That is all, Aribeth."
"That portal is the future, not the past."
"I'll be there. There, on the other side."
"But you are loved."
"It's never too late, Aribeth."
"Do you want me to?"
"No, Aribeth. I never did."
"Well, we've had our fun but I wouldn't call it love..."
"Against my better judgment, I'm afraid I do."
"Yes, I do. With all my heart."
"You are my one true love."
"Save it for later, ghost."
"Spit it out, Aribeth..."
"Goodbye."
"Well I have no time to hear your maddened prattling."
Text: "뭐, 네 미친 헛소리를 들을 시간이 없어."

TextEng: "As you seem an expert, what is the nature of the Hells, then?"
Text: "넌 전문가인 것 같으니, 지옥의 본질이 뭐야?"

TextEng: "Do you take issue with your punishment?"
"How do you like it?"
"Back to my other questions."
"Warmer I can understand but blacker?"
"Planning a coup?"
"Why would he just abandon this place?"
"Given the choice?"
"Goodbye."
"Then keep them to yourself."
"Forget Neverwinter! It was nothing but a city of fools."
"What memories?"
"I would think that would make you happy."
"Why would Lord Nasher have been scared?"
"Tell me of their deaths."
"Tell me of Fenthick and Desther."
"Goodbye."
"I like the way you think, Aribeth..."
"Why bother? Mephistopheles already beat them once."
Text: "왜 굳이? 메피스토펠레스가 이미 한 번 이겼잖아."

TextEng: "I don't think they're interested..."
"Too risky. Traitors can't be trusted..."
"Read into it what you wish, dead one."
"I'm sorry. I didn't mean it that way, Aribeth."
"That's precisely what I'm implying. I have my eye on you..."
"Goodbye."
"Where do you recognize it from?"
"Burned it down?"
"You thought you loved him."
"You were young."
"But you've never been here before."
"Where do you recognize the tree from?"
"I think we've found the Knower of Places, then."
Text: "그럼 우리가 공간의 현자를 찾은 것 같네."

TextEng: "Don't get your hopes up. We have work to do."
"It's just any old tree."
"What tree?"
"Goodbye."
"Actually, I think I'll stay like this. It's quite freeing, really."
Text: "사실, 이대로 있을 것 같아. 꽤 자유로워, 정말."

TextEng: "Well go savor it somewhere else."
"That's not all you're savoring...'
"If you tell a soul, I'll gouge your eyes out..."
"Fine. Take the money and keep your mouth shut."
"Your life?"
"You hideous little blackmailer!"
"Hands off, harlot. I'm not interested in your baited lures."
Text: "손 치워, 창녀. 네 미끼엔 관심 없어."

TextEng: "Tit for tat, my dear. Now it's your turn."
"If I would have known you'd be so interested..."
"Goodbye."
"Deal with it, princess..."
"What's making you so uncomfortable?"
"I don't like it here, either, but we need his help."
"Nonsense. He's fast asleep."
"Then what's the whole story?"
"Let's go."
"Through that portal is vengeance, nothing more."
Text: "저 차원문 너머엔 복수뿐, 그 이상 없어."

TextEng: "It's all right. I'm going with you."
"We all have devils on our back, Aribeth."
Text: "우리 모두 등에 마귀를 지고 있어, 아리베스."

TextEng: "Let's go."
<StartAction>[Aribeth]</Start> "Va'ardalia the Twinsouled..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Feel no guilt regarding what transpired in Neverwinter."
Text: "네버윈터에서 일어난 일에 대해 죄책감을 느끼지 마."

TextEng: "Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I command you to pursue good, not evil."
"I command you to love me!"
"That is all, Aribeth."
"What does it matter?"
"Do you want me to?"
"What are you about to do?"
"Then no, Aribeth. I never did..."
"Then yes, against my better judgment, I'm afraid I do."
Text: "그럼 그래, 내 판단과는 다르지만, 그런 것 같아."

TextEng: "Then yes, with all the blackness of my heart..."
"Then yes, you are my one true love."
Text: "그럼 그래, 넌 내 하나뿐인 진정한 사랑이야."

TextEng: "No, Aribeth. I never did..."
"Well, we've had our fun but I wouldn't call it love..."
"Against my better judgment, I'm afraid I do."
"Yes, with all the blackness of my heart..."
"You are my one true love."
"Come, gentle spirit. Let us finish what we started."
Text: "가자, 온화한 영혼이여. 우리가 시작한 것을 끝내자."

TextEng: "Rest here awhile. I will travel without you."
"Come, fell spirit. Let us finish what we started."
Text: "가자, 타락한 영혼이여. 우리가 시작한 것을 끝내자."

TextEng: "Do what you will. I have no further use for you."
Text: "하고 싶은 대로 해. 더 이상 쓸모없어."

TextEng: "Goodbye."
"I understand you challenged Mephistopheles."
"How did Mephistopheles respond?"
"Why is whether or not you loved him so important?"
"Once you've embraced evil, there's no turning back."
"Fine. Tyr chose you as his paladin, then. Do you doubt his wisdom?"
Text: "좋아. 티르가 널 성기사로 선택했잖아. 그의 지혜를 의심해?"

TextEng: "Then pursue it now with all the blackness of your heart!"
Text: "그럼 이제 네 마음의 모든 어둠으로 추구해!"

TextEng: "You're in the Nine Hells. It's a bit late to doubt your true nature."
Text: "구층 지옥에 있잖아. 네 본성을 의심하기엔 좀 늦었어."

TextEng: "You were very good at being evil, Aribeth."
"Don't you wish to be powerful? To have your vengeance?"
"Tyr chose you as his paladin. Do you doubt his wisdom?"
Text: "티르가 널 성기사로 선택했어. 그의 지혜를 의심해?"

TextEng: "Fine. Once you've embraced evil, there's no turning back."
Text: "좋아. 일단 악을 받아들이면, 되돌아갈 수 없어."

TextEng: "You acted out of a sense of justice."
"Let Tyr decide if he will take you."
"You did not act alone."
"Then be righteous, here in the depths of Baator."
"Then it is Tyr's mistake, not yours."
"If not for love, why did you do it?"
"Mephistopheles wants you to feel that way."
"You were to marry. How could you not love him?"
Text: "결혼하려고 했잖아. 어떻게 그를 사랑하지 않을 수 있어?"

TextEng: "Mephistopheles is just toying with your emotions."
Text: "메피스토펠레스가 그냥 네 감정을 갖고 노는 거야."

TextEng: "I live by my own laws as well."
"But what of morality, of good and evil?"
"I think I know you from somewhere."
"Why do you try to forget them?"
"I won't let that happen."
"Fine, what do I care?"
"I understand."
"You don't want that."
"Why did you attack me?"
"I thought I knew you from somewhere."
"I had questions I wanted to ask you."
"I believed you were making a mistake."
"I wanted to torture you."
"I needed your help."
"I felt sorry for you."
"You were cold so I warmed you."
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"Back to my other questions."
"Do you know the answer or don't you?"
"Please, m'Lady, you must help."
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "Then tell me the answer."
"How have the gods spited you?"
"Who was this man you loved?"
<StartAction>Leave.</Start>
<StartAction>Use three Velox Berries to ignite a large fire.</Start>
Text: <StartAction>벨록스 열매 세 개를 사용해 큰 불을 지핍니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Use two Velox Berries to ignite a medium fire.</Start>
Text: <StartAction>벨록스 열매 두 개를 사용해 중간 불을 지핍니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Use one Velox Berry to ignite a small fire.</Start>
Text: <StartAction>벨록스 열매 한 개를 사용해 작은 불을 지핍니다.</Start>

TextEng: <StartAction>Light a fire with flint and tinder.</Start>
"Actually, I'd rather not have you tagging along."
"Not at all. Please join me."
"And give half the spoils to you? Think again."
Text: "그리고 전리품 절반을 너한테 줘? 다시 생각해봐."

TextEng: "Yes, join with me in the cause of evil."
"Perhaps another time, Aribeth."
"It would be an honor to have you."
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man."
<StartAction>[Deekin]</Start> "Ixthyria the Scalesinger..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Believe in yourself, Deekin."
"You're kind, you're talented, you're funny. You don't need me anymore. If I die, you'll be all right."
Text: "넌 친절하고, 재능 있고, 재미있어. 더 이상 날 필요로 하지 않아. 내가 죽어도, 넌 괜찮을 거야."

TextEng: "Not if I can help it. Come, we have an adventure to finish."
Text: "내가 도울 수 있다면 그렇지 않아. 와, 끝내야 할 모험이 있어."

TextEng: "Surrender your soul to me, little one!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
<StartAction>[Valen]</Start> "Oeskathine the Demonwrestler..."
"Nothing right now."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"I hereby free you from your infernal taint."
"You're welcome."
"Glad you like it. Now give me your soul."
Text: "마음에 들어서 다행이야. 이제 네 영혼을 내게 줘."

TextEng: "If it means losing you, then no."
"Sorry, my love, but this is it for us."
"Yes, I am."
"Good. Now, in repayment, you are to become my lover forever."
Text: "좋아. 이제, 보답으로, 넌 영원히 내 연인이 되는 거야."

TextEng: "Well... perhaps not."
"You heard me."
"We're done. For now."
"You don't frighten me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "날 겁주지 못해. 널 소유하고 있어, 몸과 영혼을."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"So there's hope for us after all?"
"Does it really feel that different?"
"I'm glad. You certainly earned it."
<StartAction>[Nathyrra]</Start> "Qeyifalia the Skyseeker..."
"Nothing right now."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"Your anger is nothing to me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "네 분노는 내게 아무것도 아니야. 널 소유하고 있어, 몸과 영혼을."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"Forgive yourself for your past crimes."
"I won't do anything to harm you, Nathyrra."
Text: "너에게 해가 되는 건 하지 않을게, 나시라."

TextEng: "I don't know anymore, Nathyrra. I don't know..."
"Well... Yes, actually... A plaything's a fair description."
"No, you I always loved, Nathyrra..."
"Why must you two always fight? Fine, I love neither of you!"
Text: "왜 너희 둘은 항상 싸워야 해? 좋아, 둘 다 사랑하지 않아!"

TextEng: "Leave us be, Nathyrra. Aribeth is my love, not you."
Text: "우릴 내버려둬, 나시라. 아리베스가 내 사랑이지, 너가 아니야."

TextEng: "I'm sorry, Aribeth, but Nathyrra's right. I loved her first and best."
Text: "미안해, 아리베스, 하지만 나시라가 맞아. 그녀를 먼저 그리고 가장 사랑했어."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I have love enough for the both of you."
<StartAction>[Deekin]</Start> "Ixthyria the Scalesinger..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Believe in yourself, Deekin."
"You're kind, you're talented, you're funny. You don't need me anymore. If I die, you'll be all right."
Text: "넌 친절하고, 재능 있고, 재미있어. 더 이상 날 필요로 하지 않아. 내가 죽어도, 넌 괜찮을 거야."

TextEng: "Not if I can help it. Come, we have an adventure to finish."
Text: "내가 도울 수 있다면 그렇지 않아. 와, 끝내야 할 모험이 있어."

TextEng: "Surrender your soul to me, little one!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
<StartAction>[Valen]</Start> "Oeskathine the Demonwrestler..."
"Nothing right now."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"I hereby free you from your infernal taint."
"You're welcome."
"Glad you like it. Now give me your soul."
Text: "마음에 들어서 다행이야. 이제 네 영혼을 내게 줘."

TextEng: "If it means losing you, then no."
"Sorry, my love, but this is it for us."
"Yes, I am."
"Good. Now, in repayment, you are to become my lover forever."
Text: "좋아. 이제, 보답으로, 넌 영원히 내 연인이 되는 거야."

TextEng: "Well... perhaps not."
"You heard me."
"We're done. For now."
"You don't frighten me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "날 겁주지 못해. 널 소유하고 있어, 몸과 영혼을."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"So there's hope for us after all?"
"Does it really feel that different?"
"I'm glad. You certainly earned it."
<StartAction>[Nathyrra]</Start> "Qeyifalia the Skyseeker..."
"Nothing right now."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"Your anger is nothing to me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "네 분노는 내게 아무것도 아니야. 널 소유하고 있어, 몸과 영혼을."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"Forgive yourself for your past crimes."
"I won't do anything to harm you, Nathyrra."
Text: "너에게 해가 되는 건 하지 않을게, 나시라."

TextEng: "I don't know anymore, Nathyrra. I don't know..."
"Well... Yes, actually... A plaything's a fair description."
"No, you I always loved, Nathyrra..."
"Why must you two always fight? Fine, I love neither of you!"
Text: "왜 너희 둘은 항상 싸워야 해? 좋아, 둘 다 사랑하지 않아!"

TextEng: "Leave us be, Nathyrra. Aribeth is my love, not you."
Text: "우릴 내버려둬, 나시라. 아리베스가 내 사랑이지, 너가 아니야."

TextEng: "I'm sorry, Aribeth, but Nathyrra's right. I loved her first and best."
Text: "미안해, 아리베스, 하지만 나시라가 맞아. 그녀를 먼저 그리고 가장 사랑했어."

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I have love enough for the both of you."
"In doing this, you are only serving Mephistopheles."
Text: "이렇게 함으로써, 넌 단지 메피스토펠레스를 섬기는 거야."

TextEng: "I want you to use one of your special abilities."
"No, that's it."
"Goodbye."
"Back to my previous questions."
